    Introduction to Linked Open Data for Ancient Near Eastern Studies

    Shai Gordin April 16, 2023 LOD, ontology

    A tutorial introducing the main concepts and resources for applying linked open data to your databases and research pipelines.

    Quick guide to the Ancient Language Processing Python Library

    Avital Romach April 16, 2023 python, ALP, cuneiform

    A tutorial introducing the main function currently available in the ALP python library and how to use them to preprocess and tokenize cuneiform texts.

    Contact us

    For any questions about OpenDANES, send us an email at the Digital Pasts Lab (digpasts@gmail.com)
